Title: Pink Floyd: The Wall
Actors: Bob Geldof, Christine Hargreaves, James Laurenson, Eleanor David
Plot: A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.
Awards: Won 2 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.
Production: Metro Goldwyn Mayer, Tin Blue, Goldcrest Films, Ltd.
